hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.trazilica

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.trazilica.Document
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentQuery

    public class Document
extends Object
    Represents single document to be stored in the database.
    Author:
    ilijan

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      protected double[] tfIdfVector
      TF-IDF vector for the document.
      protected List<String> words
      List of all non-stopping words in the document.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Document

        public Document(File file,
                Set<String> stopwords)
        Constructor initializes new Document using path to file and the set of stopwords.
        Parameters:
        file - path to file.
        stopwords - set of stopwords.

      • Document

        protected Document()
        Default constructor does nothing. Required to enable definition of constructors with different signature in children classes.

    • Method Detail

      • splitWords

        protected static List<String> splitWords(String document)
        Splits string representing document to list of words. Any number of successive non-letter characters is used for splitting words. Words are transformed to lower case for the sake of uniqueness.
        Parameters:
        document - string representing document.
        Returns:
        list of words contained in document.

      • getWords

        public List<String> getWords()
        Getter for the list of all words contained in the document.
        Returns:
        list of words contained in the document.

      • calculateFrequencyVector

        public void calculateFrequencyVector(Vocabulary vocabulary)
        Calculates frequency vector for the document using provided vocabulary. Document vocabulary is set to provided vocabulary which is also later used for calculating TF-IDF vector.
        Parameters:
        vocabulary - vocabulary to be used when calculating frequency vector and IF-IDF vector.

      • calculateTfIdfVector

        public void calculateTfIdfVector(List<Document> documents)
        Calculates TF-IDF vector using vocabulary stored in vocabulary and provided list of documents.
        Parameters:
        documents - list of documents used for calculating TF-IDF vector.

      • getTermFrequency

        public int getTermFrequency(String word)
        Gets frequency (number of occurrences) of the given word in the document.
        Parameters:
        word - word which frequency is returned.
        Returns:
        frequency of the given word.

      • calculateSimilarity

        public double calculateSimilarity(DocumentQuery query)
        Calculates similarity of given query to the document. Similarity is given in range [-1, 1], where bigger number means greater similarity.
        Parameters:
        query - object representing user query.
        Returns:
        number which measures similarity of query to the document.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getPath

        public Path getPath()
        Getter for the path of the document.
        Returns:
        path of the document.
